message.body: Test drove the ##### again, this time at ############### in #######. Liked the car, hated the dealership.
Yeah, I had a similar experience there.
I had an immediate Russian mob vibe there. Plus they gave me the classic 'what can we do to sell you a car today?' line.
Oh, and they had the classic sales dude with a bad toupee.
I've heard that ######### is pretty decent if you want to get the ##### but not from then
My sales guy printed me out a sheet comparing the ##### with the ###### that was flat out wrong. Like 10 mpg low on their estimates.
Yeah, they were the first place I went to. Much friendlier, lower pressure place
